name: The Ultimate ASMR Airport Walk - Detroit Metro Airport (DTW)
description:
Thanks for joining me for another ambient airport walk; this time, we're walking through Detroit Metro Airport, one of the largest and busiest airports in the country! 

Unlike other tours I do, this one covers every terminal as I explore it; no music, no narration, no interruptions! 

Whether you want to see the detailed layout of this airport, you're curious about what's around the corner, or you want to relax to the sights and sounds of travel, I hope you enjoy this video and those to come! 

If possible, please comment and tell me what you liked or didn't like about this video. Do you like more annotations as we walk? Maybe better footage of the art and exhibits in the connector? Is metadata interesting to you, like the time of the walk, direction, distance walked, etc.? 

Check the chapters if you're interested in something specific!

Finally, let me know where you'd like to see next! Stay tuned for new flight and airport videos every two weeks!

The contents of this video and its production are not endorsed by any entity portrayed therein, and none of the entities provided any input or compensation in the production of this video.

If you'd like to speak with me directly about the contents of this video or my channel, you can reach me at milesbyfoot at gmail.com.

Thumbnail by my artist wife, Beth!

IG: bethmclain.art
Twitter: Marshmallowbat

00:00 - Intro
00:40 - McNamara Concourse B
07:40 - McNamara Concourse C
16:20 - Underground Tunnel (Flashing Lights)
19:20 - McNamara Concourse A
47:50 - Express Tram
51:30 - SkyClubs and Airside Entrance
53:15 - McNamara Landside
54:10 - Evans Landside
57:45 - Evans Airside
1:17:30 - End Screen

Thanks again for watching, and keep moving forward!

#detroit #dtw #deltaairlines #spiritairlines #airport #aviation #travel #ambient #asmr 
_______________________________________

Equipment Used
GoPro Hero 7 Black
Nikon D3200 (18-55/55-200mm)
FeiyuTech G6 Gimbal
Adobe Premiere Pro
IrfanView
